Heart

Class Heart_Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • Heart.Heart_Core

  • public class Heart_Core
extends java.lang.Object
    Core Heart class. Handles every operation of the Server

        public static boolean isConfigSet()

      • startHeartServer

        public void startHeartServer(int port)
                      throws ServerInitializationException
        Starts up the Server for this Heart Core object.
        Throws:
        ServerInitializationException - if there is an error creating the server for any reason. If the exception is thrown, abort attempt to create server

      • startMediaServer

        public void startMediaServer(ListItem media,
                             ClientConnection client)
                      throws ServerHelperException
        Start the server the Shard will connect to allowing for Media Streaming
        Parameters:
        media - String chosen media URL
        client - ClientConnection Shard client object requesting media playback
        Throws:
        ServerHelperException - Thrown when there is an issue creating the MediaServerHelper. Details will be in the getMessage()

        Pull the Shard version from the local ShardVersion file and apply it to the local variable for use

        Returns:
        true if the server is still active, else false.

      • notifyShardsOfUpdate

        public void notifyShardsOfUpdate()

      • stopHeartServer

        public void stopHeartServer()
        Stop the Heart server.

        Unregisters the DNS_SD service on the network Closes server connections Stops the server thread Closes the Media Manager Stops the Update Checker Sets all variables to null
